page.syntax: Set_Name as C = ui_prompt_new_set([C default_name [,L warn ]])

argument.name: Set_Name
argument.description: The name of the new set.

argument.name: default_name
argument.description: The default name to place into the Specify Set Name dialog box.

page.description: Prompts for the name of a new set.
page.discussion: The UI_PROMPT_NEW_SET() function displays the Specify Set Name dialog box, then returns the fully qualified name of the new set.
